summary: CAR SUDDENLY BEGAN MISSING AND RUNNING VERY ROUGH.  DROVE ONLY A SHORT DISTANCE & CAR STOPPED RUNNING.  THE DEALER SAID THE UPPER INTAKE MANIFOLD PLENNUIM NEEDED REPLACED, AS WELL AS THE PLUGS REMOVED & CLEANED.  ALSO NEEDED OIL, FILER & COLLANT CHANGED.  COST OVER $750 TO REPAIR & MANIFOLD WAS ABOUT THE ONLY ENGINE COMPONENT TO NOT BE INCLUDED UNDER THE ADD'L SERVICE CONTRACT WE HAD PURCHASED.
